EmailTemplate.name: Meeting Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Aviation Portfolio | Craig Ross
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear XXX,
We would like to set up a meeting with {!Contact.FirstName} and our CEO Craig Ross.
The meeting should not take longer than 10 minutes.
Craig Ross, the former COO of Marquis Jet (acquired by NetJets), founded Aviation Portfolio in 2011.
Will you please let us know a good time to meet?
Alternatively, you may click below to schedule at your convenience.
SCHEDULE ONLINE (In-Person Meeting)
Warmest Regards,
Daniel Harris Senior Analyst Aviation Portfolio, LLC 3435 Ocean Park Blvd, 107B Santa Monica, CA 90405 310-788-9780 (Office)
